content.detailedDescription:
One evening i was out with girlfriends at a popular club for mature adults. three men came in that had a strange aura about them. they were impeccably dressed and seemed to "float" through the crowd, they looked glowing. i was not drinking at the time. one was the leader who was dressed in a black suit, the other two seemed to minister to him.For some reason i had the most eerie feeling that they were there for me. i ignored them and i was up on a higher tier standing with my back to a small bar.

 i felt as though something was burning through my body, like a sizzling feeling. i turned quickly and saw the man in black and then i saw a giant galaxy of stars and gases and felt a zooming sensation come over me. when i shook my head and opened my eyes the man in the black suit was staring at me. i was petrified and didn't know what just happened. i was afraid and the man came over and asked me if i would like a drink. i accepted out of fear. his friend started talking to me and began to read my mind. they knew i had a dear friend, a scholar from peru, they knew the name of his town and who he was. i was baffled and felt numb. the man in black "dave" asked me to dance. 

as i danced a slow dance with him he asked me if i saw what he saw when i looked at him. i said "yes,what was that?" he said that is the galaxy we come from. i almost shook in my being. i didn't know what to say, i was baffled and scared. i told him i'd call him when he gave me his card. i went home and from that night on for the whole summer i was afraid to go home. i felt like someone was watching me from the sky. i had night terrors waking up and feeling someone was in my room. i had gynecological problems start. there is more! i testify i am 100% truthful and will submit to hypnosis and a polygraph.
content.summary: Person to person contact

content.detailedDescription: Was walking across a parking lot with a friend when i noticed a light coming  thru the clouds heading from the southwest to the northeast. thought it was odd as there was no sound. the object came over the top of us and then and my friend took a couple pics with her i phone and then it shot straight up and out of sight. first appeared to be round when i first saw it come thru the cloud and then more like a boomerang.  was totally in shock over seeing this and has taken me some time to report it.I think the pics tell the story.
content.summary: First appeared to be round when i first saw it come thru the cloud and then more like a boomerang

content.detailedDescription:
While hunting with family and family friends when i was 17 years old, in the mountain of pa. near the end of our day, we formed a line to put a deer drive on for my uncle. we all lined up on a path at the top of the hill, i was last in the line. during the winter, vegetation was low and there was about 1 to 1 1/2 inches of snow on the ground. to my left was the line of family and friends and to my right was a big glacier boulder. the boulder is about the size of a 2 story house, and you can see it from a small distance away. as we started the drive down the hill, i notice the vegetation staying low, after taking about 10 to 15 steps i noticed that there was something wrong. after taking another undetermined amount of steps, i came upon a path, a path that i should not be on. hunting in the area for 5 to 6 years, i know the area very well. as i came to the path, i began to look around. i did notice any of my fellow hunters, but i did notice the same glacier boulder that was on my right, is now on my left. i began to walk on the path toward were i was before. i kept on looking at the snow on the ground looking for any track, seeing nothing. the only sound i remember hearing is the wind and only thing seeing in the sky was snow. as i got closer to where i was before i could here one of my friend calling my name, i met him and he asked what happen. as i was starting to tell him what happen my father came up to us. he listened to what i had to say, then when i was done he just said i got lost. 
so we decided to perform the drive again. i got back to my exact spot i was at before, because i can see my tracks in the snow. when we started again, i looked at the ground watch where my tracks lead me. after about 5 to 6 feet, my tracks were no more, and all i seen was new snow that was undisturbed. i asked about what happen again that night, and my father stated again that i got lost. later when we got home, i told my mother what happen, and she made the joke that i was visiting my true father. i did ask, and she did say she is joking. 

what really disturbs me is the distance between where i left the path with the glacier boulder to my left and where i came onto the path with the glacier boulder to my right. i estimated the distance to be about 100 to 150 yards, maybe more. i don't know how much time had past because i was not wearing a watch at the time. and i have not been back to that spot since the incident happen. we never went back there to go hunting since that time because we decided to go to another area, closer to where our family cabins are located. i don't tell a lot of people about this incident, i estimate that i only told about 20 people, and none of them think i crazy or that i lying. and after all of these years, i still don't remember anything at all.
content.summary: While hunting in the mountain of pa, i believed i was abducted.

content.detailedDescription: Family member looked out of balcony window at 23:20 , saw 2 red lights in sky left of venus. i stepped out and observed red lights in sky. thought at first they maybe helicopters but there was no noise what soever.The 2 of them formed a l shape if there was a line between them. the red looked like inferred lights that you would see in night flight headset in movies of night vision footage.As i looked closer with binoculars it was more like a round red light. they floated there for a few minutes, then flew to the right the bottom one acceded towards the other then they disappeared into the sky above venus. this was observed by myself and a family member. i have sent you a video from my iphone, sorry its not very clear but you can make out the 2 red light one roughly 10 o'clock from venus and the other almost at 12. venus being the bright light in bottom right. i have also sent you a screen capture with them circled and indicated .
content.summary: 2 red lights over victoria bc, held still then flew right and acended

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my back porch facing west when i noticed a very bright pulsating light in the sky.  i then went back into the house and told my son to come outside and see this light.  we both observed (with binoculars) the light pulsating different colors.  after about five minutes of being stationary it started to slowly move farther away getting dimmer until it completely disappeared into the western sky.  

 bright pulsating light slowly getting dimmer until it disappeared.  seemed to fade instead of moving.
content.summary: Bright pulsating light slowly getting dimmer until it disappeared.  seemed to fade instead of moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I have over 100 pictures with various sightings of lights in the sky/orbs/spheres ect.. but would prefer to not send them over the internet before being contacted by someone. please give me a call or text so we can talk and i could send more of my photos. 

thank you,
[name and phone number removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Washington orbs/lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on my patio smoking my e-cigarette, i was facing east, which has my looking directly at my house. i heard a strange jet like noise coming from the east, and as it got closer it became more of a buzzing/whistle/vibrating/jet engine sound. i was pretty excited because i thought maybe a jet fighter was flying overhead and those are rare to see where i live. my patio is covered for the first 12 feet until it becomes a wooden deck, so as i was sitting down i had to turn over my right shoulder to see the object flying past. when i saw the object finally see the object its a glowing white diamond shape heading west, it was moving only slightly faster that a passenger jet seen from the ground. i got up to get a better and watched it head west for about 10 seconds and as it got further i noticed it wasn't one big white light, but multiple smaller white lights, and then it disappeared. after it disappeared i continued to hear its noise for roughly 3 seconds.
content.summary: A unidentifiable diamond shaped object with white lights covering the entire bottom flew over my house

content.detailedDescription:
This is not your typical look out the window i see something in the sky
report. i was in my house and noticed a light flash once in a while.
i would be in bed wake up to see the room lite like a full moon. as i would get up like a touch lamp the light would get dimer in three stages.
i would see sparkling lights in the darkness. one morning i saw something move on the wall, as i watched counted at least 100 ships enter the bedroom. it has been 7.5 years now that my bedroom has been a classroom
for alien and their ships.Started 2008 got worse 2011 here we are 2015.
they are still here. i have seen many different ship and races of aliens.
i have had many different experiences. i have 2 journals. they live with me 24/7. i get few words but do get them. i will not go into detail because there is so much to tell. i have 7.5 years of stories and events.
sometimes i can see into their ships. i have orbs, ships both small, medium and on occasion a large one i mean it is lager than the 10' x 13'
bedroom i sleep, in. 

wall
content.summary: I was in bed, i woke up to see a small orb hovering over my head / face. it quickly covered it self with a smoke like cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on route 202/206 approaching the high voltage power lines south of i-78.  i noticed a very low flying craft up ahead. it was gliding slowly eastbound and had large lights.  about ten seconds later the craft came into sight again gliding westbound. i crossed paths with it. it came into view in front of me and i never took my eyes off of it as it glided by. i drove under it as it glided out of view of my windshield.  it glided very slowly in my line of sight from left to right for about 4 seconds.  i estimate it was about 500 ft off the ground and the "wing" span was at least 100ft.  the front end was boomerang shaped.  it had five large lights along the boomerang end, one at the tip, one at the center of each "wing" and one at the end of each "wing".  the lights were bright white but did not project any beam of light.  i could tell that the craft was more than just a boomerang shape because it was very dark behind the white lights and there was one small blue-ish ring of light about 50ft behind the center white light. i heard no noise as it glided by.  i pulled over hoping to see it in the distance but the area where i pulled over had many trees. i drew a sketch of it for my husband but have no way to scan if from home to attach.
content.summary: Gliding craft with bomerang shaped front end, 5 large white lights along "wings", small blueish ring towards the center or rear of craft

content.detailedDescription:
I often step outside, at all hours, for a look at the sky. looking up i noticed what appeared to be a plane. the belly light was flashing about once per second. watching, it wasn't moving. no other nav lights were visible. after about 5 seconds (5 flashes) it started moving to the west, increasing speed. the speed increased until the light flash became a streak. the object took approximately two seconds to make a 90 degree turn to the north (left), continuing for some distance to suddenly stop, again.

i made a quick look for other aircraft, seeing none at that time. when i looked back the object was gone.

the photo i have attached, shows the location during the day. i have overlaid this with the approximate movements of the object. i drew the streaks to approximate what i actually saw.

there are four main points to this sighting:

1) at the beginning and at the end of the sighting the object appeared stationary.

2) no visible wing navigation lights.

3) very abrupt, very fast, course change.

4) no noise.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very fast direction change

content.detailedDescription:
1. where i was was on my way on vacation from new york to florida. 2. i was not the first to notice the object all the cars from both sides of the interstate were coming to a stop to see what was in the air hovering about 50 feet off the ground.Number 3 i did not know what to think of it nor did anyone else many people had stopped and got out of their cars and everyone was very shocked because the crafts made no noise.Number 4 the craft seem to be a circle butts not a perfect circle kind of like a circle that had flat tops and bottom. what it did next was go from sitting at a horizontal angle to moving to a vertical angle at this time it was about 10 to 20 feet off the ground, at this time i was still in the car with my brother while all the adults got out i would estimate around 70 adults got out. at this time what happened was the light got brighter and these beings started approaching myself and others.Number 5 the feeling i got was awkward while i was worried i didn't seem to be terribly afraid and i did not think that they were there to harm me because they would harm to my parents first as they were 50 yards away in between us. 

they then took me and 10 other children into the craft we were all kind of excited except for one girl who was crying but she was around 8 years old i was between 10 and 12 they took us somewhere in the craft and showed us a bunch of things that had to do with the world but it's a little foggy on exactly what it was later on in life i was visited again but before that i can say that i woke up in the car after i had watched the shuttle take off at incredible rate of speed i know i seen that but then i woke up in the car with everybody driving like nothing had happened. as i say i lost sight of the object when it took off at around a 80 degree angle into the stars at a tremendous amount of speed with no noise. later i noticed that i myself felt older and was able to do things that many others could not at my age it was like i had lived 5 to 10 years and that's small time that i was with them.
content.summary: Driving to florida from new york everyone stopped to see a craft on i 75 hovering like a disc then the craft turn vertical came down towards the ground and being scammed out. most of us children remembered only a  at the fastest rate of speed i ever
content.locationName: Not sure. off interstate , South Carolina

content.detailedDescription:
I had an exchange student staying at my house.  i arrived home from work, was standing at the top of my gate unlocking it when i saw a shadow of what looked like a person start running from my house toward my water tank.  i watched as it ran and could only see if for the lack of anything behind it making it's profile visible and it looked black in appearance as if it was a shadow. it looked like a person as it had two legs, two arms and was running.  it ran very close to the water tank location, suddenly the person's shadow disappeared and i saw it enter an odd shaped object that quickly lifted off the ground.  right after it lifted off the ground i assumed i would see it go into the sky, but instead it completely disappeared and i didn't see anything in the sky, it just completely vanished.

  i drove down to my house looking around the water tank to be sure no one was there and decided not to say anything to my exchange student as to what i saw as it was odd and unexplainable.  when i entered the house she was hysterical and walking all over the living room.  she said there had been something outside the house, she didn't know what it was and she was afraid.  it took about 10 minutes for her to calm down.  i told her what i had seen once she calmed down and asked her if it was a person.  she said she didn't know what it was but she was frightened as she knew there was something outside the house.  i told her about seeing an object that looked like a person running from the house, getting into an object that looked large and black, it starting to take off from the ground and then it completely disappeared once it was about three feet off the ground it vanished. there was no way a person could have driven anything onto the property as there were locks on gates in the three locations where you could access my property and barbed wire fences that enclosed the property.  i was unable to find any of my fences cut and the only way anything could have left my property from the location i saw it on would have been to fly and yet i saw nothing after it had ascended three feet. in a way i wasn't surprised, this was not the only time something strange happened on my property.  there was another time when the very tops of two trees were burned and one year later both trees died but no other trees on the property were affected.
content.summary: Clearly saw a shadow running from my house jumped into an object & disappeared when it took off.

content.detailedDescription: May 2, 2015 evening hours.  direction west by northwest towards luke air force base, glendale, az. from 75th avenue and thunderbird area. lights were photographed by 16 year old daughter.  a second attempted to photograph the lights was made, but disappeared at same time.
content.summary: Just taking pictures of neighborhood, looked up saw lights, took picture.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were swinging on the swing set to see who could go the highest . all of a sudden it got south caldwell county nc we both lend back and looked up . that's when we saw it . my sister jumped out of the swing , jumped over the patio yard fence into the patio yard and ran into the house to get my mother . they both came out to the patio yard . by this time a smaller version came out of the ufo and held me captive in a beam of light about three to five feet off the ground . i could hear my mom and sister yelling at me but could not understand what they were saying . i looked down and i could see them below me in the patio yard . all of a sudden the light let go and i fell to the ground . then both disc flashed bright lights that vibrated the ground . i was laying on the ground looking up , the small ufo was zipping back and forth above the swing set . the large one that was about 90 foot in the air , the orafe in the middle of the big ufo opened up for the second time and i could see up into it as the small one went back up into the big ufo . i could see it attaching to something inside the large ufo. it looked like it was attaching to a cobweb , then it turned black and the orafes closed . the ufo went higher up in the air and hovered , then it disappeared . to me it seemed like the whole sighting was only about 15 minutes . when it finally disappeared i went and climbed the fence into the patio yard and went up to my mother and sister . they both thought i appeared out of thin air . they dragged me into the house and locked the doors . they were hysterically crying . it did not scare me but made me feel extremely happy . the only other thing i can say about this sighting is that it seemed to me that these disc's where living , breathing things . the sighting occurred after lunch about 1 pm when we went to play on the swing set . after my mother dragged me in the house , locked down the doors i went and turned on the tv and one of my favorite show's was on " wallis and ladamoe which came on right before the news around 4 pm .
content.summary: The size of a football field , silver on the  top , roll of lights in middle , and looked like a turtle shell on bottom with a metal orfis in middle.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my friend bill and he dropped me off at the end of my road where i lived, a short walk to the house about 200 yrds. i was walking down my road when i noticed a bright light in the sky. it was not moving or making any sound. it was about a half mile away, hovering over a wooded area. it was very bright, you could tell it was not a plane or helicopter. as i walked down the road i saw a cloud form about 20 feet from object then the cloud moved to the object. so i ran into the house to wake up my parents and sister. when we came out of the house the cloud was breaking up and the object was gone. my family did not stay outside very long but i did and about 10-20 min. later planes and helicopters filled the sky, they were everywhere, flying all around. i sat outside watching and waiting, i just knew it was not gone. and about 15 min. after sky was clear it shot up from the ground, it was the same size but not as bright. it was in the same place as before, when the cloud covered it and it went to the south. this all took about 2hrs. my friend bill was home watching a ball game on late, when he saw it out his picture window.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw bright object in sky,cloud formed about 20 feet from object then cloud moved to object and the cloud broke up object was gone . sky filled with planes and helicopters, they left and object shot up from ground went south.

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture of our garage corner and never saw the object. it was 7:04pm and the sun was far to the west (picture taken to se). i didn't notice anything else in the picture until 2 weeks later when i was deleting pictures. there were no aircraft in the area and no sound in the area when i took the picture.
content.summary: Took picture of garage corner. didn't notice object until 2 weeks later when deleting pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving a truck east bound ih 10 near seguin tx i first heard the chatter on the cb of course i ignored it but they kept talking about these ufo's, strange lights that made a truck crash when the object crossed over the highway at mile marker 599 and emitting intense heat, i said no not so peasant words and drove on. well at mile marker 614 i saw it through the fog very bright flood lights on the right as i got closer i saw the brightest clearest lights in a approximately 200 foot wide circle with one light missing i'm guessing that there was 11 lights in the circle and one in the middle emitting a beam straight to the ground about 15 feet from the roadway, as i drove under the objects lights at 65 mph i felt intense heat with the a/c blowing in my face. about 100 yards down the road another on the left and 100 yard down another on the right and another 100 yard down on the left. they did not move and made no sound i have not been a believer in ufo's but i am now. 
 i have never seen anything like that ever and i used to live on dugway proving grounds in utah in the early 80's, where i saw lots of strange thing fly around real fast and then disappear but meant absolutely nothing to me. this scarred me so bad it has changed my life and the way i see it i will never look into the sky the same way again. when i got to mile marker 599 there was an 18 wheeler overturned on the westbound side. if any of you truckers that witnessed that heard what i called you well let this be my apology i will never doubt again.
content.summary: 4 hovering objects hovering with lights in a circle and a beam in the middle and very hot

content.detailedDescription:
Hello
my name is [name removed/cms/tg] and i live on a cliff overlooking the whole east side of akron, ohio and beyond.  it was march 2, 2015 around 8:15pm.  it was a beautiful star filled sky.  i have 3 airports and several hospitals that use helicopters that i watch regularly and observe.  this night i witnessed a beautiful orange light far off on the horizon. it intrigued me because the orange color was so unusually beautiful i wanted to see the aircraft fly over and see what it was.  thought it may be a new model helicopter. it was stationary which generally means its an aircraft flying towards me.  over several minutes of enjoying the view and stars i noticed that this beautiful orange light hasnt moved position. i could tell because of the cell towers blinking lights. this grabbed my curiousity and i turned around opened slider door and shut it and looked out to see the light as i was about to run to grab binoculars and it was gone.  i ran back outside to the cliff to look for running lights or any light to justify what just happened.  there wasnt any aircraft lights in the sky. i must admit i felt a scared feeling i never felt before.   i ran to my neighbors house and told them what i had just witnessed so if someone did report a ufo sighting i would have credibility. couple of days later i googled ufo reports in ohio and there it was.  a ufo was reported in ravenna, ohio around 8 pm and vanished on march 2.  i would like to know more and if i can be of any help please contact me. thank you
content.summary: Beautiful orange light that disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside in front of my house to smoke a cigarette, i stay looking in the skies because i highly believe in ufo watch the show all the time together with all the other shows on discovery history channel etc.
what made me first notice is the bright light when i see a light brighter than usual i tend to keep an eye on it and sure enough was not long before it just dropped and proved to me it was not a star not a falling one.
it looked like the north star very bright and big in my eye view it was about the size of a baseball color was like a yellowish white glow, i didn't see no type of motion it was there for a few moments and dropped instantly i was amazed it was not the first i've seen but it definantly 
gave me proof that i was not seeing things but that they actually exist after i seened it i showed my husband and my kids they were 4,5, and 9 at the time i had recorded it but did not mention it because i don't have the phone anymore everything was deleted because i sold my phone and my husband reacted as a sceptic but he is a believer so the story faded but we both seened another incident at a different address that the both of us witnessed together and that one he spoke of for days.
i lost sight of the object when it just went straight down towards the military grounds is the only thing i could think of since the base was around that location.
content.summary: Location removed] i seened it more towards the air base it was at a standstill, then suddenly just dropped straight down  at a very fast pace

content.detailedDescription:
It was a pattern of three rectangles translucent flying in formation like an arrow and as they slowed and hovered they formed into one main craft and took off at an incredibly high speed
was watching it from back patio.  translucent glowing 3 rectangles flying in formation above my head than flew into a single craft as it hovered than flew off as one craft. i was gazing at the stars it was a beautiful clear night. i could not sleep.
content.summary: Translucent glowing 3 rectangles flying in formation above my head than flew into a single craft as it hovered than flew off as one craft

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
A conical big mother ship hovered from north-west towards south-west and stood for a moment.  they sent a telepathic message that jesus is inside, which is a lie because i have met jesus already, he is too big to fit into that ship.  that ship had starlets like shining ships all around its lower half.

then they showed me something like the moon.  the moon-like object came near at about just 10 feet above me.  it rolled like a sphere and showed me hebrew-like characters but not hebrew. i know hebrew.

then the small star-like ships formed a zero-like (0) formation first, then a hundred (100) like formation, then a zero (0), then a ten (10), then a (10), then a ten (10), then a zero, one (01), then the formation disappeared into the south-west as i was not interested to see it.

then i got telepathic information from the mother ship saying jesus is inside again, which i didn't believe. jesus comes before me face to face and speaks clearly.  he doesn't need binary codes, etc to communicate with me.

then i felt like a robot-like alien beside me and i unconsciously said we have to set up a conference between some higher entity-9k-and people.  to some haughty exclamation from that alien i said "we are 9k, we are not people."

the alien wasn't happy about being 9k as it felt we have no powers on earth and are just like humans.

then i came home.  everything was like a dream.

i am the most important author of the state, but people don't know me yet.  i have had many encounters with watchers, fallen, demons, etc.

have seen god the father, jesus, have see the fire of the holy spirit, angels, etc.  have seen many types of spaceships, etc.

i don't understand why aliens are trying to contact me.

once a telepathic disturbance from a self-flying robot-like little helicopter asked me so, "who are you? tell me the truth! who are you?"
content.summary: They showed me binary patterns by aligning star-like glowing ships, another big cone mother ship luminous, with star like ships swarming around it, they showed me a sphere-shaped scroll of hebrew-like letters, i said we are 9k. they weren't proud of it.

content.detailedDescription:
At 12o'clock midnight
seen what looked like a shooting star till it stopped dead still shocking me and my buddy then as it was just above us it flashed a blue light lighting the entire sky as far as you can see the went straight up with unbelievable speed leaving a trail of light behind it.
content.summary: Standing on back porch what seems as a shooting star stopped in place as soon as i seen it flashing blue lighting up the entire sky then when straight up leaving a blue streak behind it

content.detailedDescription:
I was 7 years old at the time of the event, july, 20th of 1987. my girlfriend's parents had just bought some land near amarillo, texas, and my parents followed her parents out to visit the property and hang out. though i do not know the exact location, i know it was within 10 miles of the city.

it was about midnight when we arrived and my girlfriend and i were drawn out into the field for some unknown reason. it was not typical for either of us to just wonder off into a dark field without our parents. her brother, my brother, and our parents were busy getting stuff out of their vehicles and apparently didn't notice we were walking off.

when we got about 350 feet from the vehicles an object appeared in the sky on the right side of us and hovered there. it appeared without any noise 20 feet from us and about 30 feet above the ground. we both saw it appear and froze as we looked at it. i felt paralyzed, but not afraid, and time seemed to have stood still. i first noticed the lights, which were emitting from large circular windows. 

as i looked into the windows it seemed as thought there was some sort of thick colorful gas or liquid inside which pulsated in a way i had never seen. to this day, the closest thing i can use to describe it is bio-luminescence similar to a comb jellyfish, except that the colors swirled in the windows. i also recall that it seemed like colors were included that i have never seen before, colors outside of our normal visual spectrum. 

the pulsating light coming from the windows mesmerized me, and i had a sense like something within the object was observing us. i remained calm, but in awe of what i was seeing. i could see the top and bottom half of the object rotating in different directions because the windows were moving in opposite directions. the light from the windows did not shine on the ground, nor did they seem to illuminate the outside structure of the object. but i know it was not orbs, because the object's structure blocked out the sky and stars behind it. which allowed me to see the general outline of the object. though i saw the windows moving around the object in a circular motion, i saw no moving parts or dividing sections. the surface of the object did not seem reflective, and was blacker than the night sky behind the object.

i had the sense that something was being communicated, but had no way of articulating what it was. then suddenly the object zipped off in a straight line up into the sky and out of view. it was so fast that at one moment it was right there in front of us, and the next it was a tiny dot, then gone. i have never seen anything move that fast in my life. it did not cause displacement of air, and made no sound as it ascended.

once the object had ascended, my girlfriend and i looked at each other with our jaws dropped in amazement. we then ran back to the vehicles. though the event seemed to take about 5 minutes, our parents and siblings were still getting the same stuff out of the vehicles they were when we had walked off. we both adamantly tried to tell them of what we had seen, but were ignored as they were preoccupied with getting stuff out of the vehicles. 

after this event, many things occurred which are hard to explain, but i suspect may be related. my girlfriend and i never talked about it, and years later she passed away in her sleep, leaving me to be the sole living witness to the event. until now, i have only told a handful of friends and family about my experience that night.

i have searched various ufo photos for this particular object and the only one i have found which looks remotely similar in general shape is the famous gulf breeze ufo. i have included basic drawings i have made of to illustrate the experience of the object i saw.
content.summary: My girlfriend and i were drawn out to a field late at night where we saw sudden appearance of circular lights rotating in opposite directions on the side of an object. i was paralyzed during the event and time seemed to stand still until it left.

content.detailedDescription:
This took place in august, 2005 on the 20th and 21st and i reported it to ufo bc.  the only reason i am mentioning it now is because i heard an interview with chris bledsoe on veritas radio.   he mentioned that mufon had told him the last time those beings were here was in 1952 when they buzzed the white house.   i just felt i should say they were here in bc in 2005 and  possibly longer and i know its the same beings.  they aren't like a normal craft swooping in....They seem to pop out of the air from nowhere.  there are other signs too..Their humour, for one.   they healed my cold sore that i couldn't get rid of.  they do other things too...Hard to describe...Like being removed from reality somewhat.  i spent quite a bit of time searching the internet to see if anyone else had ever seen them...Because they are so strange to the point i didn't know whether its a craft, an entity on its own or a spirit.  i found a report by a police officer in florida...I knew it was the same beings because he described them as so joyful, with a sense of humour and they healed his alligator bite....They were also  orange orbs. (they aren't orange all the time)  he didn't realize till the next morning his wound was healed. anyway, i am not the only one who saw them in august, 2005 because when i checked ufo bc ...The next day, august 22nd, a person in chilliwack saw what looked like an orange harvest moon in the sky that later disappeared.   that's the direction they were heading when they left burnaby on august 22nd.

so what actually happened....I sat down on my porch looking south east  and my attention was caught by very strange movement in the sky.  two objects poured, as if from a jug, into my line of sight, criss crossed each other in a spiral and then slowed down and started circling around as if searching or sight seeing.  when they came they gave me the strong impression they were having fun. at that point they looked like two silver grains of rice.  i am no good at measuring distance.  my sight of one was blocked by a tree but the other moved northwest across capitol hill slowly.   i thought to myself, i'll know its a ufo if it stops dead in the sky.   the moment i had that thought, it stopped dead.  then it was like somebody lit a fire under it and it expanded into a glowing orange orb.   then it went back to normal size...Moved south east to its original location.  then it went across the hill again, just as before. then it stopped dead and expanded again as before.  then moved back as before and went behind the tree and didn't appear again.  i went into the house thinking i'm not going to tell anyone this.  then i started phoning friends.  one of my friends said go out tomorrow night same time because sometimes they come back.   so next night i went out, same time and i started to feel taking this sighting personally because just as i sat down that one came out from behind the tree.  again it went across capitol hill, stopped in the same location and then expanded as before...But this time it make a typical flying saucer shape in light....I thought these guys are joking with me.   i started looking around to see if anyone else was around, in the park or on the street....There was a neighbour in the park, she was bending down...I have the impression i called out to her...But things seemed different at that moment...When i think of it...Well the fact is when i think of it it seems strange...Like the world outside was slow and i was fast...Also the world seemed very bright...Hard to explain.   anyway it went back behind the tree and i didn't see it again.    the next day i realized my cold sore which i'd been having a hard time to get rid of was completely gone.   i emailed a writer in england i know and he told me the english call it geoplasma and people typically have a sense of communication with them.   geoplasma really means nothing...Just they don't know what it is....Except its light.

that's about all i can say for the orb.  i do have a lot of other strange experiences which is why i liked what bledsoe had to say...Kind of puts everything together.    sometime later i did see a triangle in sky when i was driving sought up gilmore avenue.  but that experience was a bit extreme...I stopped the car to get a better look and it started to move northwest...It changed shape twice...Once to an airplane and finally to a black helicopter with a blue light that followed my car.   i hardly ever talk about that experience because frankly people would think i was hallucinating.  i wasn't...Although i have to say when you see a triangle change to a plane then a helicopter you do get a strange feeling.

in any event, my purpose in writing this is to say...It wasn't 1952 to 2008 or whenever mr. bledsoe saw them....They were here in burnaby at least since 2005 and i think in florida as well sometime before that.  they are probably always around.

i have no picture of this.   on seeing something like this the last thing anyone would do is run into the house to get a camera.  it was an elevating experience to say the least.

just another note:  i think you probably wouldn't get the humour in the bledsoe story but when i heard about one of the hunters being terrified by an alien animal chasing him, i thought i knew for sure its my friends from 2005.
content.summary: Two appeared in sky like water being poured from a jug, one become orange when it stopped and expanded into a ball

content.detailedDescription:
Viewed (unobstructed) from my front deck overlooking the valley after watching television early one evening, about an hour after dark.  first time, my wife was on the deck and called me outside to see the orbs -- then we heard the jets fly over our area going toward the orbs.  

i am a retired corporate senior manager and former combat-zone air force veteran;  observed 3 to 5 orbs in a "v" formation on 3 separate occasions (no pattern to intervals), all located in the general vicinity of the captain mountains northeast of ruidoso, nm -- between carrizozo and roswell, nm -- above or near the ruidoso airport -- over approximately a 90-day period. 

1st sighting was clear night sky in late february;  2nd was high-altitude thinly overcast night sky late march or early april. i dismissed the first two events -- but remained baffled at the cause for the sighting -- but wrote them off to "military training" and some sort of new weapons systems.

both times the orbs were stationary and were east-southeast of my location near alto, nm; they were not falling night-flares, or lights descending or ascending, but had the capability of moving laterally at high speed, then stopping "on a dime".  appeared 1, then 2, then 4, then 3, then 2 then 3, then vanished one after another;  with the 1st orb pausing, then vanishing after the others. 

both times the 1st set of two fighter jets appeared shortly after the orbs appeared.  the jets were moving at high speed (sub-sonic) toward the orbs, about 1 minute apart, from west to east directly overhead at my location.  as the jets appeared to arrive near the orbs they vanished one at a time.  the jets made a wide turn from eastbound and headed to the south and left the area.  those two sightings were nearly identical except the 1st event, there were up to 5 orbs in the same location, and the 2nd event there were only 3 orbs (...Possibly 4 because one appeared to vanish and move laterally, slightly out of the "v" shape, with slight separation to the east of the other two orbs).

the third sighting on 11 may 2015 at approximately 7:40 to 7:50 pm (mst) was unique. high thin clouds, night sky. same orange-yellow orbs -- same size, distance, and location in the sky east of my location in alto, nm.  again, two jets were heard heading west to east overhead (possibly from holloman afb) at high speed (sub-sonic)t toward the orbs, roughly 1 minute separation.  

as the 2 jets approached, the stationary orbs once again vanished in sequence, with 1 orb pausing, then it vanished last, after the others.  they did not move. they simply appeared, one or two vanished for a short period, reappeared, then they all vanished for good -- in no particular sequence.  those orbs did not move from stationary position while they were visible and there was no sound -- nothing in my experience could maneuver like that -- except a helicopter or harrier-type jet -- but there was no sound except for the 2 approaching military jets.

still during the ongoing third sighting, as the jets sped east towards roswell and soon were out of sight (and sound range), two of the original orbs re-appeared in the same location as before -- stationary and silent.  it appeared as though the two jets moving eastward must have made a wide, right-hand turn and re-approached the orbs from the south moving northward at same high speed (sub-sonic).  

two additional jets then appeared in the far northern sky estimated over vaughn, nm area moving south towards ruidoso, nm (again, not in formation) at a high rate of speed (sub-sonic) and with about a 1 minute separation (estimated 2 to 4 miles apart like the first pair). it dawned on me that they all may have been approaching in that manner for "safety" reasons, rather than flying in tighter formations.  the 1st pair of jets had done the same throughout the event.  a 3rd orbs became visible in the same stationary position as the other two to the east-southeast of my location.  

then, all of a sudden, two more orange-yellow orbs of the same size and brilliance, and due northwest of the the other orbs, appeared 90 to 100 degrees west of my location -- now there were a total of 5 orbs at two different locations in the sky. they too, appeared suddenly (one first, then the second - not simultaneously - but about 5 seconds apart) due north of my location -- and those 2 orbs sat stationary at approximately the same altitude as the other orbs but at a 45-degree angle from my location. 

the second pair of jets that were arriving southbound from the north veered west, as the first pair of jets veered off eastward over the captain mountains, once again toward roswell. each pair of jets were moving in opposite direction. then the two stationary orbs directly north of my location moved horizontally at exactly the same moment about a mile westward -- then stopped -- as though "teasing" the jets that came from the north.  as those 2 jets moved west then made wide, left-turns headed south, the two orbs "danced" briefly, and then rotated impossibly -- at tremendous speed in a perfect - vertical circle, equal-distance from each other, and each with a very faint tail -- moving counter-clockwise like you were watching the tips of the hands on a clock move backwards (from my vantage point looking due north). it was a tight vertical circle estimated at 2-miles in diameter.  the speed they were moving was impossible (in my experience) -- it was an amazing display!  there is no drone or vehicle known in my experience that could do what those two orbs did.  they did two revolutions counter-clockwise, then stopped their vertical motion in a stationary, horizontal position about a mile or so apart, then one vanished and the second vanished within about 4 or 5 seconds, later, as the westbound jets turned left again and headed north toward the area of the two "dancing" orbs.  

the four jets remained in the area a few minutes after the orbs vanished.  two of them returned northward from the direction they first came;  the first two jets to appear on scene, moved southwest as though headed toward holloman afb.  the entire event from first sighting the orbs until all the jets were gone and drifted off in the distance (detected by sound) lasted about 15-minutes or less.  there was no "hot pursuit" -- in fact, the military jets appeared to be keeping their distance from the orbs -- intentionally.  once again the sky went silent.  i live in a very remote area, and when i say "silent" that is exactly what i mean.

i noted that on the first pass by all 4 jets they were sub-sonic and displayed no lights.  as they came near to the orbs (say 3 to 5 miles away) they displayed safety blinking lights for the remainder of the event.  there was absolutely no sound from the orbs.  they appeared, moved, stopped in stationary position, then rotated, and vanished with no sound whatsoever.  

my wife witnessed the first sighting -- in fact, she called my attention to it.  she was not present to witness the 2nd and 3rd events.  i should say, that during all three sightings i did not feel "fear" - however, the orbs moving in the vertical circle was a pretty astonishing sight to see for an old air force veteran! 

next time, i will try to film the event if it happens again.
content.summary: Orange-yellow orbs appeared, were stationary, vanished, reappeared different location, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling north on hwy 89 near hatch utah.  my son who is autistic and rarely speaks unless he has a question or gets excited was sitting in the rear passenger side of our vehicle.  he says "dad look, dad look"  i thought he was just excited by the cloud formation as he is enamored with clouds and weather.  i was in the front passenger seat, we had the camera in the center console because we were shooting pictures on the way to red canyon.  i lowered my window and took the pic.  i tried to reframe a second shoot but must have panned the camera and just got a blurred imaged.  when i went to review the shot with him i noticed a blue blurred oval in the picture.   did not"notice" the blur when i went to take the picture.
content.summary: Blue blur in photo not observed when pic snapped

content.detailedDescription: Bright jupiter likeness (but not because jupiter was also in sight). it moved say 10 azimuth and then just disappeared.  it was not a plane--it did not blink or have other lights. it is in the opposite direction of the airport, which is to the east.  the only possibility is a satellite, but the sun had set 3.5 hours earlier, and the light did not fade, it shut off/disappeared.  i wish it had lasted longer so that i could have tried to video it.  i was still in the "what the heck is that?" phase when it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright jupiter likeness  it moved say 10 azimuth and then just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Have been seeing star like objects in the area for weeks. one of 5 in particular is closer than the others. looked at it tonight thru a telescope. it is what i perceive as a massive spherical mother ship with several ships in close orbit around it. hard to tell exactly how many, but but at least 2 cigar shaped ufos and 5 or more round ufos. at first i thought the large sphere was rotating. i was wrong it was the other smaller crafts rotating around it. have seen these exact ships in nasa film from iss and shuttle missions. i had eerie feelings. i took laser temperature readings of it and it was about 25 degrees colder than the space around it.
content.summary: Enormous shere, mother ship with multiple ufos around it, observed through telescope

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside talking on the phone around 9pm. the bright light caught my eye then two others appeared, followed by what appeared to be them leap frogging around each other turning off and on and circling around. they did not appear to change altitude. they were bright yellowish gold fireball like spherical orbs. i ran in to grab my wife and she came out and saw them as well before they began to fade out and disappear. i kept looking and thought i saw a light white ball floating away not in the fireball form. this is the second time i have seen this in about a month. honestly the thing it mostly makes me think about is the question, is god real, what would the religious world do if we were told the truth. would wide spread panic/chaos be a result? proof? faith? why am i seeing this? is it a privilege? surprisingly not afraid but inquizical. my dumb phone was out of storage space to take a picture.
content.summary: 3 fireball orbs playing a leapfrog game in the sky

content.detailedDescription: This is a strange picture that my family took and im not sure what it is
content.summary: Unknown
